mapper.select: SELECT o.id AS org_id, o.`name` AS org_name, o.enabled, o.pc_logo_url, o.h5_logo_url, o.category, GROUP_CONCAT(r.`name` SEPARATOR ',') AS roleNames FROM employee e INNER JOIN organization o ON o.id = e.org_id LEFT JOIN employee_role er ON er.employee_id = e.id LEFT JOIN organization_role r ON r.id = er.role_id AND r.enabled = 1 WHERE e.user_id = #{userId} AND e.enabled = 1 GROUP BY o.id
